verses.name: Psalms 68:1
verses.text: Let God arise, let his enemies be scattered: let them also that hate him flee before him.

verses.name: Psalms 68:2
verses.text: As smoke is driven away, so drive them away: as wax melteth before the fire, so let the wicked perish at the presence of God.

verses.name: Psalms 68:3
verses.text: But let the righteous be glad; let them rejoice before God: yea, let them exceedingly rejoice.

verses.name: Psalms 68:4
verses.text: Sing unto God, sing praises to his name: extol him that rideth upon the heavens by his name Jah, and rejoice before him.

verses.name: Psalms 68:5
verses.text: A father of the fatherless, and a judge of the widows, is God in his holy habitation.
